Welcome

See our food selection

Our Food

Our food is made with natural ingredients, simple recipes and authentic flavours. Let our plentiful menu guide you on a culinary journey - discover traditional seafood favourites, mouth-watering grilled and rotisserie meats, fresh vegetables and richly flavoured desserts. We buy only high quality chickens that are grain fed and hormone and steroid free.

learn about us

View Menu

About Us

About UsWith two locations to serve you better, Churrasqueira Costa Verde brings rich, eclectic tastes closer to home. For over 25 years we have been stimulating the senses with grilled and rotisserie chicken, complemented by fresh, natural ingredients - eat in, take out or have us cater your next event.

SEE OUR CATERING OPTIONS

Catering

Rely on Churrasqueira Costa Verde to spice up your next event with the freshest ingredients and carefully prepared authentic cuisine. We cater events of all shapes and sizes, from intimate family gatherings to corporate year-end celebrations. No matter the occasion, you'll enjoy the quality of service and food served up by over 25 years of experience.
